meanings.definition: Extending or covering the entire store.
meanings.sent1: The storewide sale included every item in the store.
meanings.sent2: The storewide discount applied to all products in the store.
meanings.sent3: The storewide clearance made the whole store feel like a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The storewide promotion spread excitement throughout the store.
meanings.sent5: The storewide signage made it easy to find the best deals.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or affecting all areas of the store.
meanings.sent1: The storewide policy ensured consistency across all departments.
meanings.sent2: The storewide security system protected every corner of the store.
meanings.sent3: The storewide announcement about free samples drew customers from every aisle.
meanings.sent4: The storewide reorganization improved efficiency throughout the store.
meanings.sent5: The storewide cleanliness standards kept the entire store spotless.
